name: RiddleArena
0:
”Alexa, start riddle arena”
”Alexa, ask riddle arena for a new riddle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: riddle arena
des:
Challenge yourself with riddles, you can always pass and ask for the answer if you are stuck.


if Alexa didn't accept your answer or you think there is any issue with the riddles, feel free to emai me: gautier@avenirgames.com I'll fix it!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
